title: Summon Caniforms
data:
{{obsolete}}

'''Summon Caniforms''' is a monster-only spell which summons 1-5 of the following forest-related animals:

{{monsterlink|Wolf}}(52.6%)

{{monsterlink|Black bear}}(31.6%)

{{monsterlink|Grizzly bear}}(15.8%)

Although none of these monsters are terribly dangerous on their own, they can prove a costly distraction while the caster hits you with its more dangerous spells, especially if they manage to pin you down adjacent to several animated [[tree]]s.

==History==
Summon Caniforms was removed in 0.13, when the only monster that could cast it ([[spriggan druid]]s) had their spell list updated.

[[Category:Monster spells]]
